allow: Bash(timeout 10 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://localhost:5000/api/docs > /dev/null; do sleep 1; done; echo ""Backend is ready""')
Bash(PGPASSWORD=run123 psql -h 185.244.219.128 -U afi_applicationform -d afi-application-form -c "SELECT id, status, created_at FROM questionnaires LIMIT 5;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=run123 psql -h 185.244.219.128 -U afi_applicationform -d afi-application-form -c "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS questionnaires CASCADE;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=run123 psql -h 185.244.219.128 -U afi_applicationform -d afi-application-form -c "SELECT id, email, role FROM users LIMIT 5;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=run123 psql -h 185.244.219.128 -U afi_applicationform -d afi-application-form -c "SELECT id, status, created_at FROM questionnaires WHERE status = ''submitted'' LIMIT 1;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=run123 psql -h 185.244.219.128 -U afi_applicationform -d afi-application-form -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_questionnaires FROM questionnaires;" -t)
Bash(PGPASSWORD=run123 psql -h 185.244.219.128 -U afi_applicationform -d afi-application-form -c "SELECT id, email, role FROM users WHERE role = ''admin'' LIMIT 5;")
